ee:transform.doc:name: Extract Records from DB and set as payload

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/csv header=false --- payload map ((payload01 , indexOfPayload01) -> {
Type: payload01.TYPE, ID1: payload01.ID1, ID2: payload01.ID2, ID3: payload01.ID3, ID4: payload01.ID4, ID5: payload01.ID5, ID6: payload01.ID6, ID7: payload01.ID7, (DATE_1: payload01.DATE_1 as String) if(payload01.DATE_1 != null), (DATE_2: payload01.DATE_2 as String) if(payload01.DATE_2 != null), AMOUNT_1: payload01.AMOUNT_1, AMOUNT_2: payload01.AMOUNT_2, CURR_CODE: payload01.CURR_CODE, FLAG_1: payload01.FLAG_1, FLAG_2: payload01.FLAG_2 })

logger.doc:name: Log - No Files to process
logger.message: Payload is empty or no files to process

set-variable.doc:name: Set Empty Files Response

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- p('concurSftp.accountStringJobtype') ++ "_" ++ p('concurSftp.sbsentitycode') ++ "_" ++ now() as String {format:"yyyyMMddHHmmss"}

scatter-gather.doc:name: Send Payload to Archive and Concur

set-variable.doc:name: Set Success Response
